instructions: # Character Sheet Inspired by Actoba's D&D 5E sheet. This sheet auto-calculates many fields, including, but not limited to, Ability scores & mods, Skills, HP, and Saves using the rules as written.## Attributes* You can mouse over any field to get its attribute name.* All field titles follow Roll20's attribute syntax, ie. AC would be displayed as "@{AC}" on mouse-over.## Rolls* You can mouse over any button to get its ability name.* Roll button titles follow Roll20's ability syntax, using the selected token, ie. "%{selected|STR-check}".## Using the stat block* NPC Stat Block coming soon.## Additional Notes* HP|max uses the formula within HP Formula to calculate your total HP. The default formula is "total HP gained from each class + (CON * level)"* The Initiative button adds your token to the initiative tracker, and therefore requires you to have a token selected to work. It also adds your initiative modifier as a decimal for the purposes of tie-breaking and ease of sorting.* The CS column in the skills table denotes class skills and automatically adds 3 when you put a rank in it.* If there's something you want added, or you'd like to report a bug, please contact the Sam in the "Pathfinder sheet thread 2: Golarion boogaloo" thread in the "Character Sheets" forum.## Special Thanks* I'd like to thank the following for their help in the development of this sheet.* Actoba* Phnord Prefect* Vince* Everyone in the character sheet test game
